verse: तत्कलाकोटिकोट्यंशा ब्रह्माद्या दुर्गाद्यास्त्रिगुणात्मिकाः । यस्या अंघ्रिरजः स्पर्शात्कोटिविष्णुः प्रजायते ॥ (पद्म पुराण ५-६९-११८)

terms.त्रिगुणात्मिकाः (triguṇātmikāḥ): having the nature of the three gunas (modes of material nature)
terms.स्पर्शात्कोटिविष्णुः (sparśāt koṭiviṣṇuḥ: from whose touch, countless forms of Lord Vishnu manifest

meaning: Meaning: Lord Brahma, Goddess Durga, and other deities, who are all manifestations of the Supreme Brahman, have countless divine forms. From the touch of whose feet, countless incarnations of Lord Vishnu take birth.
